title: Adobe AdCloud Search ExperienceEvent Schema
description: AdCloud Search ExperienceEvent Schemas for click event data ingestion. Includes the core/standard ExperienceEvent as well as the required Adobe AdCloud Search ExperienceEvent Mixin.
